Html:
Hi Guys,

we got two customers, each got WPP installed, now we wanna export Updates from one and Import into the other.
How can we do that? We already tried to export the certificate and import it again, but doesnt work.
Please can anybody help?

Greetz Susie

Hello,
I have the same Problem. How could I export Updates from one WSUS and Import them into a different WSUS with a different signing Cert ?

Susie: Did you get it managed to do this task ?

Best regards
Ingo
Same problem here. Is there any solution?

+1
idem as you.

ps : Why the subject is closed ?

best regards

I've found a workaround for this issue. Its possible to unpack an wpp-exported cab-file, resign the inner cab-file with the certificate of the target wpp environment and than repack it to a new outer cab-file.
I didn't know why it is set to closed
